environment.name: INCLUDE

environment.name: INETSDK
environment.value: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2

environment.name: LIB
environment.value: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2\Lib;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\LIB;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\SDK\v2.0\lib

environment.name: PATH
environment.value: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2\Bin;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2\Bin\WinNT;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\IDE;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\BIN;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\Tools;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\SDK\v2.0\bin;C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\VCPackages;C:\Program Files\Perl\binC:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\IDE;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\bin;C:\cygwin\tmp\tao\doc\iliyan-gestalt\build\vc8_d1o0\ACE\bin;C:\cygwin\tmp\tao\doc\iliyan-gestalt\build\vc8_d1o0\ACE\lib;

command.name: file_manipulation
command.options:
type=create file=build/vc8_d1o0/ACE/setenv.cmd output='set ACE_ROOT=C:\cygwin	mp	ao\doc\iliyan-gestalt uild\vc8_d1o0\ACE
set CIAO_ROOT=C:\cygwin	mp	ao\doc\iliyan-gestalt uild\vc8_d1o0\CIAO
set DDS_ROOT=C:\cygwin	mp	ao\doc\iliyan-gestalt uild\vc8_d1o0
set INCLUDE=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2\Include;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\INCLUDE
set INETSDK=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2
set LIB=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2\Lib;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\LIB;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\SDK\v2.0\lib
set LIBPATH=C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727
set MPC_ROOT=C:\cygwin	mp	ao\doc\MPC
set PATH=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2\Bin;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Platform SDK for Windows Server 2003 R2\Bin\WinNT;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\IDE;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\BIN;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\Tools;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\SDK\v2.0 in;C:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\VCPackages;C:\Program Files\Perl inC:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\IDE;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC in;C:\cygwin	mp	ao\doc\iliyan-gestalt uild\vc8_d1o0\ACE in;C:\cygwin	mp	ao\doc\iliyan-gestalt uild\vc8_d1o0\ACE\lib;%PATH%
set TAO_ROOT=C:\cygwin	mp	ao\doc\iliyan-gestalt uild\vc8_d1o0\TAO
'

command.name: file_manipulation
command.options:
type=create file=build/vc8_d1o0/ACE/bin/msbuild-adapter.bat output='@echo off
set
:process
set param=%1
shift
if not defined %param goto quit
if \x22%param%\x22 equ \x22/build\x22 goto process
if \x22%param%\x22 equ \x22debug\x22 set mode=%param%
if \x22%param%\x22 equ \x22release\x22 set mode=%param%
if not \x22%param:~-3%\x22 equ \x22sln\x22 goto process
msbuild %param% /p:Configuration=%mode%
:quit
'
